author: dagim
title: NuNet: Decentralized SPO Computing
description: いかにしてカルダノネットワークの分散化と回復力を高め、ハードウェアレベルでのビッグテック・クラウドへの依存度を下げるか。

f6_assessments.q0: This proposal could spark a symbiosis that could massively boost the decentralisation of the Cardano Blockchain. It basically enables anyone to become an SPO, even without hardware and thus effectively rewrites the SPO function within the ecosystem. It unlocks the ability to rent computing power from users in a tokenised manner, compensating all parties involved, instead of datacenters. This is a great opportunity to increase the robustness of both ecosystems.
f6_assessments.q1: The team is very experienced with Dr. Kabir Veitas, the NuNet CEO as the teamleader. Given that a solution like this is in very high demand and there is an ability to self-fund part of the project, makes this highly feasible. There has clearly gone much thought in this as there is even a failsafe system in place in case of insufficient initial participation.
f6_assessments.q2: This is qualitatively one of the best proposals that I've come across not only in this fund, but my entire CA-service. It has perfect auditability; there is a roadmap, a periodic definition of success, an expected time of launch, a funding breakdown, a risk assessment, detailed team information and KPI. There is nothing I can think of that can improve it. Well done!

f6_assessments.q0: This proposal meets the requests of the challenge seeking to help SPO computing resources from centralized cloud providers and utilizing the NuNet decentralized network of computing resources.  This project is using the SPO model as an early way to test and use the NuNet solution.  It scales out to the Cardano Ecosystem greatly as over 70% of the ADA in Cardano is tied up in Stake pools.
f6_assessments.q1: The team is associated with the Singularity network and has ample resources and experience to be able to deliver a project of this nature.  There is a rough timeline of deliverables as well as a breakdown of proposed fund spending.  This proposal is very clear on what they are planning to deliver and with what resources.
f6_assessments.q2: With the timeline, milestones, and spending breakdown for the proposal, it is very auditable in terms of deliverables and accountability with spending.

f6_assessments.q0: This proposal is the definition of SN and Cardano working together to create wealth on both sides. By providing NuNet a spinoff of SN the proposer plans on making it a breeze to become a Stake Pool Operator(SPO). This could revolutionize the way staking is being handled in the Cardano ecosystem.
f6_assessments.q1: Seeing the team leader is the CEO of NuNet I have no doubt this project will be a success and the skills and experience of the team are adequate. Seeing the funding requested for this is a huge amount of the challenge fund but given the fact that they cover about 40% of the cost themselves shows how much they believe in this project.
f6_assessments.q2: This proposal is just perfect. There is so much to gauge at, the roadmap is splendid, funding breakdown is in detail and still understandable. The proposal itself of clear and transparent. Successes are defined, KPIs, risk management, and even a fail-safe.

f6_assessments.q0: This proposal is about increasing the decentralization & resilience of the Cardano network and reducing reliance on big tech cloud on the hardware level. This is a very great and useful idea. The problem is clearly described and explained in detail. The solution is clearly defined with specific milestones, deliverables, roadmap,... This solution shows the clear expected impact on the Cardano ecosystem in short term and long term [connection between Cardano Blockchain and AI by NuNet]. Therefore, based on the given information, I strongly agree with this proposal's impact, I can rate it with a score of 5
f6_assessments.q1:
Team profile is clearly described, with suitable skills, experiences for implementation. The project's Demo running is provided with further information [for performace evaluation in reality]. The budget is provided with items structure and explanations of calculation base. However, risks and mitigation are not defined.
Therefore, based on the given information, I can agree with this proposal's feasibility, I can rate it with a score of 4
f6_assessments.q2:
This proposal provided a lot of information with reference/proof (documents/links,...) for verifying (members, technical terms,..). My only advice is: for better understanding, you should integrate metrics into the roadmap; this would help the community easier to track this proposal's progress.
Therefore, based on the given information, I strongly agree with this proposal's auditability, I can rate it with a score of 5

f6_assessments.q0: I completely agree with this idea, it has been proposed by the team since September 2021 and has a demo. SPOs may not change much, but the Cardano network infrastructure is decentralized and will attract many participants including decentralized hardware providers. The solution given is clear and solves many problems, there is one point that I am not clear and have not found in the documentation provided by the proponent, that is, the network connection speed of the hardware provider group will affect How to get to NuNet?
f6_assessments.q1: The identity of the proponent is clear including information about experience, skills and is easy to find on linked. Detailed documentation is also fully supplemented on the web and attached files. The cost is described in great detail on the top of how many people to use for how long, although the cost accounts for more than 20% of this challenge, there is also a hint of the $76,000 that the proponent will pay. Do you invest on your own or do you have other investors?
f6_assessments.q2: Risky challenges are also taken into account by the proponent, it may not be exhaustive, but I believe it will continue to be reviewed during development. The proponent has sent a development roadmap plan with resources for each different job very methodically and scientifically, the metrics and goals are clear.

solution: NuNetにより、SPOはコミュニティが提供するハードウェア上でコンピューティングワークフローを実行できるようになり、耐障害性の向上と分散化を図ることができます。
experience:
チームリーダーDr. V. Kabir Veitas - AI研究者・ソフトウェアアーキテクト、NuNet.io共同創業者・CEO
https://www.linkedin.com/in/vveitas/
